data.title: SitcomsOnline.com News Blog: 2024
data.text:
It's Sunday, so it is time for "Sitcom Stars on Talk Shows" for the coming week. This is where we list what sitcom stars are appearing on talk shows for the coming week, the stars are both current and past sitcom stars, so this is for all sitcom fans of all eras!

For the week of August 12-16, 2024, we have many current sitcom stars and past sitcom stars on TV talk shows! All times listed are Eastern. So get your DVRs (or whatever you use) ready! Ready? Here is all what you need to know for the coming week!

Sunday, August 11

Bowen Yang (Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens) and Matt Rogers (I Love That for You) - Catch Bowen and Matt on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen at 10:05pm on Bravo.

Monday, August 12

Jeff Goldblum (Search Party) - Jeff guest hosts Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Rob Delaney (Bad Monkey/Catastrophe) - Watch Rob on Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Liza Colón-Zayas (The Bear) - Liza is a guest on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at 11:35pm on NBC.

Walton Goggins (The Righteous Gemstones/The Unicorn/Vice Principals) - Walton appears on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert at 11:35pm on CBS.

John Mulaney (Mulaney) - John stops by Late Night with Seth Meyers at 12:36am on NBC.

Paul F. Tompkins (The Great North/BoJack Horseman/DAG) - Paul and Caroline are guests on After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Will Smith (The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air) and Zoë Kravitz (High Fidelity) - E! News has interviews with Will and Zoë at 11pm on E!.

Nick Offerman (Parks and Recreation) - Nick chats with the ladies of The View on a repeat on ABC at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Queen Latifah (Living Single) - Queen Latifah is joining Drew to talk about the 30th anniversary of Living Single and playing a special round of Final Five with questions from former co-star Erika Alexander on a repeat of The Drew Barrymore Show, so check your local listings.

Howie Mandel (Good Grief) - Howie talks about NBC's America's Got Talent on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Utkarsh Ambudkar (Ghosts/White Famous) - Utkarsh is a guest on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Phil Rosenthal (Creator of Everybody Loves Raymond) - Phil appears on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Tuesday, August 13

Jeff Goldblum (Search Party) - Jeff guest hosts Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Elizabeth Banks (30 Rock/Scrubs) - Catch Elizabeth on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at 11:35pm on NBC.

Bowen Yang (Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens) - Bowen appears on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert at 11:35pm on CBS.

Kate Micucci (Raising Hope/Scrubs) - Kate is a guest on a repeat of After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Vince Vaughn (Bad Monkey/Curb Your Enthusiasm/F Is for Family) and Halle Berry (Living Dolls) - E! News has interviews with Vince and Halle at 11pm on E!.

Chelsea Handler (Are You There, Chelsea?) - Chelsea discusses her new Chelsea at The Chelsea Las Vegas residency on a repeat of Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

The Cast of A Different World - ABC's The View has the 35th-anniversary reunion with the cast of A Different World, including Jasmine Guy, Kadeem Hardison, Dawnn Lewis, Cree Summer, Darryl Bell and Debbie Allen at 11am ET/10am CT-PT (Repeat).

Wednesday, August 14

Jeff Goldblum (Search Party) - Jeff guest hosts Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Greg Kinnear (Shining Vale) - Greg appears on Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Daveed Diggs (Central Park/black-ish) - Daveed is a guest on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at 11:35pm on NBC.

Meredith Hagner (Bad Monkey/Search Party/Men at Work) - Meredith appears on Late Night with Seth Meyers at 12:36am on NBC.

Jason Ritter (The Class) - Jason is a guest on a repeat of After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Mark Duplass (Big Mouth/Togetherness/The Mindy Project/The League) - Mark appears on Comedy Central's The Daily Show at 11pm.

Chelsea Handler (Are You There, Chelsea?) and

Garcelle Beauvais (The Jamie Foxx Show/Merry Happy Whatever) - E! News has interviews with Chelsea, Garcelle and the cast of Emily in Paris at 11pm on E!. Garcelle also talks about Tempted by Love: A Terry McMillan Presentation on ABC's Good Morning America some time between 7-9am.

Maya Rudolph (Loot/Bless the Harts/Forever/Up All Night) and Joel Kim Booster (Loot/Shrill) - Maya and Joel chat with the ladies of The View on a repeat on ABC at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Sydney Sweeney (Everything Sucks!) and Glen Powell (Scream Queens) - Sydney and Glen are taking a ride in the "Drewber" to tell Drew all about their movie Anyone But You on a repeat of The Drew Barrymore Show, so check your local listings.

Lily Collins (Emily in Paris) - Lily talks about Emily in Paris on ABC's Good Morning America some time between 7-9am.

Heather Graham (Californication/Scrubs/Emily's Reasons Why Not) - Heather talks about her newest film Place of Bones on a repeat of Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Debra Jo Rupp (That '90s Show/The Ranch/Better with You/That '70s Show) and Kurtwood Smith (That '90s Show/The Ranch/Worst Week/That '70s Show) - Debra Jo and Kurtwood talk about Netflix's That '90s Show on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Alan Cumming (Schmigadoon!) - Alan talks about Peacock's The Traitors on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Thursday, August 15

Jeff Goldblum (Search Party) - Jeff guest hosts Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Awkwafina (Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens) - Awkwafina appears on Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Paul W. Downs (Hacks/Broad City) - Paul is a guest on Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Halle Berry (Living Dolls) - Halle stops by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at 11:35pm on NBC. She will also be on ABC's Good Morning America some time between 7-9am.

Ben Schwartz (The Afterparty/Space Force/Parks and Recreation) - Ben appears on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon at 11:35pm on NBC.

Jean Smart (Hacks/Samantha Who?/Center of the Universe/In-Laws/Style & Substance/Designing Women) - Jean is a guest on Late Night with Seth Meyers at 12:36am on NBC.

Christine Baranski (The Big Bang Theory/Happy Family/Welcome to New York/Cybill) - Christine talks about The Gilded Age on CBS Mornings some time between 7-9am.

Tony Hale (Veep/Arrested Development) - Tony chats with the ladies of The View on a repeat on ABC at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

JB Smoove (Curb Your Enthusiasm/Blockbuster/The Millers/Bent/'Til Death) - JB chats with the ladies of The View on a repeat on ABC at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Mike Epps (The Upshaws/Uncle Buck/Survivor's Remorse) - Mike discusses his new film The Underdoggs on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu (Emily in Paris) - Philippine talks about Netflix's Emily in Paris on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Friday, August 16

Ryan Reynolds (Two Guys and a Girl) and Hugh Jackman (Human Resources) - Ryan and Hugh guest host a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Kevin Hart (Die Hart/The Big House/Undeclared) - Watch Kevin on a repeat of The Late Show with Stephen Colbert at 11:35pm on CBS.

Reid Scott (Veep/My Boys/It's All Relative) - Reid is a guest on a repeat of After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Chris Hardwick (Guys Like Us) - Chris appears on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

All listings are subject to change. Visit our blog and main site for daily updated listings. Leave us comments on our message board or Tweet/Facebook us to let us know what you think of this Sunday feature! We do listen!

Sitcoms Airing This Week

Sunday, August 11

Krapopolis - "Ty's Tail Tale" (Fox, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Tyrannis is possessed by his deceased grandfather who rules with fear and a large scorpion tail, Shlub must fight to bring back the old Tyrannis; Hippocampus and Stupendous bring a pregnant pegasus home.

Krapopolis - "Salt" (Fox, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Deliria tries to prove that anyone can be an Olympian.

Krapopolis - "War With the Roses" (Fox, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Nymph Daphne and Tyrannis arrange a meeting to negotiate peace between the city and the forest; Hippocampus and Nymph Daphne hide out in Hippocampus' bunker.

Krapopolis - "Olive Oil Crisis" (Fox, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Deliria loses her memory when she and Stupendous transform into geese; Tyrannis tasks Shlub with procuring olive oil for Krapopolis.

Monday, August 12

none scheduled

Tuesday, August 13

The Conners - "Tempest in a Stew Pot" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Jackie and Becky pitch their business plan to Darlene in hopes of getting the Lunch Box back, but Darlene's decision leads to hostility.

The Conners - "Slappy Holidays" (The CW, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Chaos ensues when Dan finally gets the entire family together for Thanksgiving dinner; mixed feelings about the Lunch Box continue to build tension in the house.

The Conners - "Lanford, Toilet of Sin" (The CW, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Jackie is faced with a difficult decision that brings the family and community together; Becky starts working a new late-night shift at Casita Bonita.

The Conners - "Smoking Penguins and Santa on Santa Action " (The CW, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Dan is disappointed when everyone but Becky forgets his birthday; Darlene faces another issue; Dan excludes Jackie from the family Christmas Santa photo for mistreating Louise.

Tyler Perry's House of Payne - "Piece By Piece" (BET, 9:00PM ET/PT)

Calvin teams up with his ex-wife Miranda to get to the bottom of why Laura broke off their engagement, while also working with Ella to repair his relationship with Calvin Jr. Meanwhile, Curtis and Floyd attempt to get publicity for their BBQ sauce brand by hosting their own cooking show on TV... if only they can get out of their own way.

Tyler Perry's Assisted Living - "Tough Love" (BET, 9:30PM ET/PT)

When Phillip makes a shocking decision, Jeremy rethinks the way he handled the recent argument between them. Everybody is worried about Phillip’s safety, and Jeremy wonders if his tough love did more harm than good. Mr. Brown goes through a breakup and turns to Anastasia to help make things right.

Wednesday, August 14

none scheduled

Thursday, August 15

Young Sheldon - "Community Service and the Key to a Happy Marriage" (CBS, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Meemaw gets assigned a tough probation officer (Octavia Spencer), and Georgie takes marriage advice from his father-in-law.

Ghosts - "The Owl" (CBS, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Sam, Jay and the remaining ghosts unravel the mystery of which ghost passed into the afterlife. Also, Sam and Jay must relocate an owl in order to do construction on the barn to turn it into Jay’s restaurant.

The Conners - "Throwing a Christian to a Bear" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

he Conners struggle to accept Becky's new boyfriend, a Green Bay Packers fan; Dan tries to impress upon Mark the importance of the family's die-hard loyalty to the Bears.

The Conners - "Mud Turtles, A Good Steak and One Man in a Tub" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Becky thinks that Jackie's new friend is taking advantage of them; Darlene is thrilled when Harris gets into Central Illinois State, but Harris might have found a better offer.

Friday, August 16

The Conners - "Live from Lanford" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

The Conners share their differing takes on whether they all think everyone should vote; Louise gets an opportunity that might send her away from Lanford.

The Conners - "Brothers, Babies and Breakdowns" (The CW, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Dan avoids coping with a death in the family, only to be confronted by it head-on; Ben and Darlene address Ben's baby fever.

Saturday, August 17

Johnson - "Strictly Business" (Bounce TV, 8:00PM ET/PT)

Omar has to play peacemaker at the office before his trip to the Bahamas. Greg meets with Atlanta theatre legend Freddie Hendricks to ask for a favor. Jarvis delivers some great news to his clients before he has a dangerous encounter.

Sunday, August 18

none scheduled

Complete TV Listings

It's Sunday, so it is time for "Sitcom Stars on Talk Shows" for the coming week. This is where we list what sitcom stars are appearing on talk shows for the coming week, the stars are both current and past sitcom stars, so this is for all sitcom fans of all eras!

For the week of August 5-9, 2024, we have many current sitcom stars and past sitcom stars on TV talk shows! All times listed are Eastern. So get your DVRs (or whatever you use) ready! Ready? Here is all what you need to know for the coming week!

Monday, August 5

Anthony Anderson (black-ish/Guys with Kids/All About the Andersons) - Anthony guest hosts a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Lisa Kudrow (HouseBroken/Web Therapy/The Comeback/Friends/Mad About You) - Watch Lisa on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Sam Richardson (The Afterparty/HouseBroken/Detroiters/Veep) - Sam appears on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Timothy Simons (HouseBroken/Veep) and John Ross Bowie (Speechless/Retired at 35/The Big Bang Theory) - Timothy and John are guests on a repeat of After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Michael Richards (Kirstie/The Michael Richards Show/Seinfeld) - Michael talks about his new memoir Entrances and Exits on a repeat of ABC's The View at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Wendell Pierce (The Odd Couple/The Michael J. Fox Show/The Weber/The Brian Benben Show/The Gregory Hines Show) - Wendell is a guest on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Liza Koshy (Liza on Demand) - Liza appears on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Courtney Thorne-Smith (Two and a Half Men/According to Jim/Day by Day/Fast Times/) - Courtney, Daphne Zuniga and Laura Leighton discuss their new Melrose Place podcast on a repeat of Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Tuesday, August 6

Anthony Anderson (black-ish/Guys with Kids/All About the Andersons) - Anthony guest hosts a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Howie Mandel (Good Grief) - Catch Howie on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Saoirse-Monica Jackson (Derry Girls) - Saoirse-Monica appears on a repeat of The Late Show with Stephen Colbert at 11:35pm on CBS.

Ed Helms (Rutherford Falls/The Office) - Ed is a guest on Comedy Central's The Daily Show at 11pm.

Jenny Slate (The Great North/Big Mouth/Married/Bob's Burgers) - Jenny and Blake Lively talk about It Ends with Us on NBC's Today some time between 7-9am.

Kathy Najimy (King of the Hill/Veronica's Closet), Wendy Makkena (Listen Up/Oliver Beene/A League of Their Own) and Sheryl Lee Ralph (Abbott Elementary/Fam/Instant Mom/Moesha/It's a Living) - ABC's The View has a Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit reunion event show celebrating the 30th anniversary, featuring Whoopi, Kathy Najimy, Wendy Makkena, Sheryl Lee Ralph at 11am ET/10am CT-PT (Repeat).

Alison Brie (Community/GLOW) - Alison is a guest on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Rob Lowe (Unstable/The Grinder/Parks and Recreation/A New Kind of Family) and John Owen Lowe (Unstable/The Grinder) - Rob and John are interviewed on PIX11 Morning News on WPIX in New York at 8:50am.

Wednesday, August 7

Martin Short (Only Murders in the Building/Mulaney/I'm a Big Girl Now/The Associates) - Martin guest hosts a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Melissa McCarthy (God's Favorite Idiot/Nobodies/Mike & Molly/Samantha Who?) - Watch Melissa on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Nick Kroll (Big Mouth/The League/Cavemen) - Nick is a guest on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Austin Butler (Ruby & the Rockits/Zoey 101/Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide) - Austin and Callum Turner talk about their show Masters of the Air, working with George Clooney as a director, first crushes and more on a repeat of The Drew Barrymore Show, so check your local listings.

Ron Howard (Arrested Development/Happy Days/The Andy Griffith Show) - Ron talks about Jim Henson Idea Man on a repeat of ABC's The View at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Billy Gardell (Bob Hearts Abishola/Mike & Molly/Yes, Dear) - Billy is a guest on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Max Greenfield (The Neighborhood/New Girl) - Max appears on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Thursday, August 8

Lamorne Morris (Woke/New Girl) - Lamorne guest hosts a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Sebastian Maniscalco (Bookie) - Catch Sebastian on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Gillian Jacobs (Love/Community) - Gillian is a guest on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Jeremy Allen White (The Bear) - Jeremy appears on a repeat of The Late Show with Stephen Colbert at 11:35pm on CBS.

Carl Tart (Grand Crew/Rob Riggle's Ski Master Academy) and Mary Elizabeth Ellis (It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia/Santa Clarita Diet/The Grinder/Perfect Couples) - Carl and Mary are guests on a repeat of After Midnight at 12:37am on CBS.

Vince Vaughn (Curb Your Enthusiasm/F Is for Family) - E! News has an interview with Vince at 11pm on E!.

John Stamos (UnPrisoned/Fuller House/Grandfathered/Jake in Progress/Full House/You, Again?) - John talks about the new season of UnPrisoned on Live with Kelly and Mark, so check your listings.

Chelsea Peretti (Brooklyn Nine-Nine) - Chelsea is a guest on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Friday, August 9

Lamorne Morris (Woke/New Girl) - Lamorne guest hosts a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Marlon Wayans (Marlon/The Wayans Bros.) - Watch Marlon on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Bowen Yang (Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens) - Bowen is a guest on a repeat of Jimmy Kimmel Live! at 11:35pm on ABC.

Michael Urie (Krapopolis/Partners) - Michael talks about his Broadway show Once Upon a Mattress on Live with Kelly and Mark, so check your listings.

Ayo Edebiri (Big Mouth/The Bear) - Ayo chats with the ladies of The View on a repeat on ABC at 11am ET/10am CT-PT.

Ryan Reynolds (Two Guys and a Girl) and Hugh Jackman (Human Resources) - Ryan and Hugh are guests on ABC's GMA 3: What You Need to Know at 1pm.

Harry Hamlin (Movie Stars) - Harry has a cooking demo on a repeat of The Talk on CBS at 2pm ET/1pm CT-PT.

Patrick Warburton (Crowded/Rules of Engagement/Less Than Perfect/Seinfeld) - Patrick talks about his new film The Dual on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Jay Ellis (Insecure/The Game) - Jay chats about his latest book Did Everyone Have an Imaginary Friend (or Just Me)?: Adventures in Boyhood on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

Y'lan Noel (Insecure) - Y'lan talks about Apple TV's Lady in the Lake on Access Daily with Mario & Kit, so check your local listings.

MC Lyte (Partners in Rhyme) - MC is a guest on New York Living on WPIX in New York at 10:05am.

All listings are subject to change. Visit our blog and main site for daily updated listings. Leave us comments on our message board or Tweet/Facebook us to let us know what you think of this Sunday feature! We do listen!

Sitcoms Airing This Week

Sunday, August 4

Krapopolis - "Big Man on Hippocampus" (Fox, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Hippocampus is ostracized for his unconventional appearance, Tyrannis takes him to a science convention where he is finally appreciated for his intellect.

Krapopolis - "Tydra" (Fox, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Tyrannis invites a suicidal Hydra to come live with him and his family; everyone grows to love her, but Tyrannis comes to regret his decision when she accidentally embroils Krapopolis in chaos.

Krapopolis - "Prince Hippo" (Fox, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Atlanteans approach Krapopolis, Shlub reveals that Hippocampus is technically the king of Atlantis; a priestess visits Deliria and offers her services.

Krapopolis - "A Krapwork Orange" (Fox, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Hippocampus and Stupendous train an unruly group of town-children and accidentally create an apex predator; Tyrannis hopes to win over an attractive critic.

Monday, August 5

The Neighborhood - "Welcome to the Future" (CBS, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Calvin and Marty encounter difficulties trying to secure financing for their new business. Also, Dave invites his boss, Gregory (guest star John Ross Bowie), to Grover’s 13th birthday party, much to Gemma’s frustration.

The Neighborhood - "Welcome to the Other Neighborhood" (CBS, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Calvin and Marty are surprised when their new business sparks protests from residents concerned about gentrification. Also, Grover’s family tree project reveals fresh details about the whereabouts of Dave’s estranged father, who left when he was a child.

Tuesday, August 6

The Conners - "Rage Against the Machine" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Dan gets injured while covering D.J.'s vending machine route, the decision to sue the company could cost D.J. his job.

The Conners - "Don't Shoot the Piano Teacher" (The CW, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Ben offers Mark free piano lessons, Darlene uses it as an opportunity to test his parenting skills; Jackie throws Becky a baby shower.

The Conners - "We Continue to Truck" (The CW, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

As Darlene grapples with a life-changing offer from Ben, an unexpected conversation with David turns her world even more upside down.

The Conners - "Preemies, Weed and Infidelity" (The CW, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

In the wake of Emilio's deportation, Jackie steps into the role of a paternal figure and creates a meticulous birth plan for Becky.

Wednesday, August 7

none scheduled

Thursday, August 8

Young Sheldon - "A Fancy Article and a Scholarship for a Baby" (CBS, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Sheldon’s published paper leads to a frenzy of grad school recruiting, and Georgie tries to speak more properly in front of his daughter.

Ghosts - "The Heir" (CBS, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When a woman named Kelsey (Jessie Ennis) shows up claiming to be the rightful heir to Woodstone Mansion, Sam and Jay enlist the help of a lawyer, Dan (P.J. Byrne). Meanwhile, Isaac tries to decide how to spend half of Sam’s advance on his autobiography. Also, a surprise event takes place that could dramatically change life at the manor.

The Conners - "A Kiss is Just a Kiss" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Darlene struggles to decide between David and Ben; Becky begins to doubt herself as a mum; Mark gets in trouble at school when a picture of him & his boyfriend kissing goes viral.

The Conners - "The Preemie Monologues" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Harris is forced to confront Darlene about her lifestyle; Jackie involves herself in other people's problems to avoid confronting her own.

Friday, August 9

The Conners - "Lanford...Lanford" (The CW, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Desperate for more income, Becky seeks a bartending position at Casita Bonita, causing major concern for Dan due to her struggle with alcoholism.

The Conners - "Nightmare on Lunch Box Street" (The CW, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Halloween brings nothing but horror for Jackie after she uncovers a shocking secret when trying to reopen the Lunch Box; Mary gets upset when a woman assumes she is adopted.

Saturday, August 10

Johnson - "The Help" (Bounce TV, 8:00PM ET/PT)

Omar's new hire brings new energy into his company. Jarvis stages a fake appraisal with some help from a familiar face and Keith gets a new side gig that he's not very good at.

Sunday, August 11

Krapopolis - "Ty's Tail Tale" (Fox, 8:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

When Tyrannis is possessed by his deceased grandfather who rules with fear and a large scorpion tail, Shlub must fight to bring back the old Tyrannis; Hippocampus and Stupendous bring a pregnant pegasus home.

Krapopolis - "Salt" (Fox, 8:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Deliria tries to prove that anyone can be an Olympian.

Krapopolis - "War With the Roses" (Fox, 9:00PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Nymph Daphne and Tyrannis arrange a meeting to negotiate peace between the city and the forest; Hippocampus and Nymph Daphne hide out in Hippocampus' bunker.

Krapopolis - "Olive Oil Crisis" (Fox, 9:30PM ET/PT) (Repeat)

Deliria loses her memory when she and Stupendous transform into geese; Tyrannis tasks Shlub with procuring olive oil for Krapopolis.

Complete TV Listings
